forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Gusty winds developing. A mix of clouds and sun giving way to cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow diminishing this evening. Partial clearing overnight. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h, becoming SE and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph, becoming SE and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early. Scattered thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning with scattered thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening. Partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening. Partly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. Thunder possible. High 41F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low -4C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Mostly clear late. Low 27F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 66F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 70F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
